RootLayout.title: FaFa878
RootLayout.description: Online Casino Games and Sports Betting

CasinoPage.title: Online Casino Games - Slots, Classic Casino Games & Bonuses
CasinoPage.description: Discover an exciting selection of online casino games at FaFa878. Play slots, table games, and live dealer games while enjoying unbeatable bonuses and thrilling gameplay. Start your casino adventure today!

SportsPage.title: Sports Betting - Online Sportsbook - Bet Online At FaFa878
SportsPage.description: Experience the thrill of sports betting at FaFa878. Bet on your favorite sports, enjoy live betting options, and take advantage of exciting odds and promotions. Start placing your bets today!

AffiliatePage.title: Join FaFa878 Affiliate Program - Earn High Commissions
AffiliatePage.description: Partner with FaFa878 and maximize your earnings through our high-paying affiliate program. Get top commissions, real-time tracking, and exclusive promotions. Join now!

PromotionsPage.title: Exclusive Casino Promotions & Offers - FaFa878
PromotionsPage.description: Discover unbeatable online casino promotions at FaFa878. Enjoy daily bonuses, free spins, cashback deals, and limited-time offers. Don't miss out—boost your winnings today!

RewardsPage.title: Exciting Casino Rewards & Bonuses - FaFa878
RewardsPage.description: Unlock exclusive rewards and bonuses at FaFa878. Join our loyalty program to earn free spins, cashback, and VIP perks. Experience the best online casino incentives today!

VipPage.title: VIP Casino Rewards & Exclusive Perks - FaFa878
VipPage.description: Join the FaFa878 VIP Club for elite casino rewards! Enjoy personalized bonuses, higher cashback, priority support, and exclusive promotions. Elevate your gaming experience today!

ProfilePage.title: Your Profile - Manage Account and View Progress | FaFa878 Affiliate Program
ProfilePage.description: Access your FaFa878 affiliate profile to manage account settings, track your earnings, and monitor your progress. View your affiliate tier, benefits, and performance at any time. Stay up-to-date with your success in the program!

GamePage.title: Play Top Casino & Sports Games - Game Details & Live Players | FaFa878
GamePage.description: Explore in-depth details of your favorite casino and sports games at FaFa878. View game descriptions, player stats, and live activity. Join the action and start playing now!

SponsorshipsPage.title: FaFa878 Sponsorships - Partner with a Leading Gaming Brand
SponsorshipsPage.description: Discover sponsorship opportunities with FaFa878. Partner with a top online casino and sportsbook to boost brand visibility and engage with a global audience. Explore collaboration options today!

Privacy.label: Privacy
Privacy.description: User privacy is one of the core values of Fafa878. These settings allow you to be completely anonymous from the rest of the players.
Privacy.ghostModeDescription: Your username will not appear in public bet feed and bet preview.
Privacy.hideStatsDescription: Other users won't be able to view your wins, losses, and wagered statistics.
Privacy.hideRaceStatsDescription: Other users won't be able to view your race statistics.

CommissionRules.label: Commission Rules
CommissionRules.turnoverRequirementDescription: Commission can be transferred to the main wallet. A 4x turnover is required before withdrawal.
CommissionRules.minimumWithdrawalDescription: A minimum commission of 5 Baht is required to withdraw to the main wallet.
CommissionRules.maxDailyCommissionDescription: Maximum commission for inviting friends is 3,000 Baht daily.
CommissionRules.eligibleDepositsDescription: Only deposits made by friends without any promotions are counted.
CommissionRules.calculationTimeDescription: The system calculates your friends' losses daily from 00:00 to 23:59. Income is calculated every day at 8:00.

Advantages.label: Exclusive advantages
Advantages.instantPayoutDescription: Skip the wait. See earnings instantly in your account.
Advantages.lifetimeCommissionDescription: If the people you refer keep playing, you keep getting paid.
Advantages.marketLeadingValueDescription: Grow your earnings with some of the highest returns offered to players.
Advantages.customCommissionDescription: Tailor your commission plan to fit your unique business needs.
Advantages.cryptoLocalCurrenciesDescription: Earn your way with support for both cryptocurrency and local currencies.
Advantages.multiLanguageSupportDescription: Get the help you want in your preferred language all day, everyday.

Funds.notice: Transfers affiliate commission to your available balance.

General.answer1: FaFa878 is an online gaming platform offering a variety of casino and sports betting options, providing users with an engaging and secure gaming experience.
General.answer2: Yes, FaFa878 is a licensed and regulated platform that ensures fair gaming and secure transactions for all users.
General.question3: How can I create an account?
General.answer3: Creating an account is easy! Simply visit FaFa878.com, click on the 'Register' button, and follow the instructions to register.
General.question4: What payment methods does FaFa878 accept?
General.answer4: FaFa878 accepts a variety of payment methods including credit/debit cards, e-wallets, and cryptocurrency options for deposits and withdrawals.

AffiliateProgram.question1: What is the FaFa878 Affiliate Program?
AffiliateProgram.answer1: The FaFa878 Affiliate Program allows individuals, businesses, and influencers to earn commissions by referring new players to FaFa878.com. Affiliates can monetize their audience by promoting FaFa878's gaming platform and receiving rewards for successful referrals.
AffiliateProgram.question2: Who can join the FaFa878 Affiliate Program?
AffiliateProgram.answer2: Anyone who has a platform to promote FaFa878, including bloggers, influencers, website owners, and digital marketers, can join the program. There are no strict requirements, making it accessible for both beginners and experienced marketers.
AffiliateProgram.question3: How do I join the FaFa878 Affiliate Program?
AffiliateProgram.answer3: Joining is simple! Visit the FaFa878 Affiliate Program page, sign up with your details, and wait for approval. Once approved, you will receive a unique referral link and access to marketing tools to start promoting.
AffiliateProgram.question4: What are the benefits of joining the FaFa878 Affiliate Program?
AffiliateProgram.answer4: Affiliates enjoy competitive commission rates, real-time tracking of referrals, exclusive marketing materials, and dedicated support. Additionally, there are no upfront costs, making it a risk-free opportunity to earn passive income.

Earnings.question1: How do I earn money through the FaFa878 Affiliate Program?
Earnings.answer1: You earn commissions by referring new players to FaFa878. The more active players you refer, the higher your potential earnings.
Earnings.question2: When and how do I receive my affiliate commissions?
Earnings.answer2: Affiliate commissions are paid on a regular basis via your preferred payment method. Payments are processed once you meet the minimum payout threshold.
Earnings.question3: Is there a limit to how much I can earn?
Earnings.answer3: No, there is no earning limit! Your income potential depends on the number of referrals and their activity on the platform.
Earnings.question4: How can I track my earnings?
Earnings.answer4: You can track your earnings and referral statistics through the affiliate dashboard, which provides real-time insights into your commissions and performance.
